page.title: 17OUR GAMES
page.content:
Children in {Merton}play many well-tried games,both inside and out. Simon Ley writes---"I like Monopoly because it is fun to play.You have to buy property.You can build houses or hotels." Michael Davison writes---"The game I like most,outdoors,is Marbles.I play it on a manhole cover.You have to get one of your marbles in the hole." Rebecca Ley writes---"My favourite outdoor game is French Hopscotch.It is a game where you throw a stone onto the squares and hop on the squares."
Other children prefer more modern introductions such as computer games. Tracey Hunt writes---"The game I like is 'Ghostbusters'.It is a game on the computer in which you try and get rid of ghosts.When you lose all your money you die and the ghosts laugh."
